name: Vulpoids - Lost Project
author: confer0 & Yanzihko
description: Rediscover the long-lost technology of the Exodyne Biotech megacorporation, and use it to change the face of the Persean Sector into something a little fluffier. Compatible both with 0.96a-RC6 and 0.97a-RC6 versions of Starsector
